message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm afraid I can't meet you at $1100000. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $1300000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $1150000?
I understand that you're still a bit above your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $1250000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $1200000?
I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $1275000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $1225000?
I understand that you're trying to get as close to your budget as possible, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $1290000. What do you think?
I appreciate all the compromises you've made so far, but I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. Would you be willing to meet me at $1250000?
